pages.text: With some testing and studying, you've managed to recreate one of the Nephilim's greatest folly, though without the whole betrayal thing of course.

The master of blazes can be healed by right-clicking it with Blaze Powders or Rods, and can passively heal if their owner dons a Nether Robe, much like their lesser brethren. So intune to fire, they regenerate when standing on one and heal when struck by fiery attacks (with some... exceptions).
